title: Deutsche Kunst und Denkmalpflege
additional-notes: This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

Deutsche Kunst und Denkmalpflege was the title used for two intervals of a long-running preservation publication.  The first interval was 1934-1944, the second was from 1952 to 1993.  'Die Denkmalpflege' was used in intervals both before and after these intervals.  Other titles were used as well at various points.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
